query: CONDUCT A research on blockchain and recent research that has been going on

pipeline.purpose: to fetch and summarize recent academic papers on blockchain
to fetch the latest news articles on blockchain developments
to create visualizations of the data gathered from academic papers and news articles
pipeline.input: structured data from summaries and news

pipeline.purpose: to synthesize the gathered information into a coherent and comprehensive answer
pipeline.input: summaries from arxiv_summarizer, news articles, and visualizations

plan.reasoning: To fulfill the user's request, we will first gather academic papers on blockchain from Arxiv to get a comprehensive overview of recent research. We will also fetch the latest news articles to understand the current trends and developments in the field. After summarizing the academic papers and news articles, we will create a visual report to present the data effectively. Finally, we will use the QA engine to synthesize the information into a detailed answer, ensuring that the response is comprehensive and up-to-date.
